00054 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 // Function: process_state_executing_runtime
00056 //
00057 // Parameters:
00058 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 void uvm_common_phase::process_state_executing_runtime(uvm_component *pcomp)
00060 {
00061     std::ostringstream outmsg;
00062     sc_process_handle process_handle;
00063 
00064     // TODO: what should we do about process handle??
00065     //       should we even spawn it?  or let phase_execute spawn it?
00066 
00067     if (_name.compare("run") == 0) 
00068     {
00069         process_handle = sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_component::run_phase, pcomp, this));
00070         pcomp->set_run_handle(process_handle);
00071     }
00072     else if (_name.compare("reset") == 0) 
00073     {
00074         process_handle = sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_component::reset_phase, pcomp, this));
00075         pcomp->set_reset_handle(process_handle);
00076     }
00077     else if (_name.compare("configure") == 0) 
00078     {
00079         process_handle = sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_component::configure_phase, pcomp, this));
00080         pcomp->set_configure_handle(process_handle);
00081     }
00082     else if (_name.compare("main") == 0) 
00083     {
00084         process_handle = sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_component::main_phase, pcomp, this));
00085         pcomp->set_main_handle(process_handle);
00086     }
00087     else if (_name.compare("shutdown") == 0) 
00088     {
00089         process_handle = sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_component::shutdown_phase, pcomp, this));
00090         pcomp->set_shutdown_handle(process_handle);
00091     }
00092     else
00093     {
00094         outmsg << _name << endl;
00095         SC_REPORT_FATAL(UVM_PHASE_UNKNOWN, outmsg.str().c_str());
00096         exit(1);        // TODO - is 'exit()' needed here after a FATAL?
00097     }
00098 }
00099 
00100 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 // Function: process_state_executing_nonruntime
00102 //
00103 // Parameters:
00104 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 void uvm_common_phase::process_state_executing_nonruntime(sc_core::sc_module *pmod)
00106 {
00107     std::ostringstream outmsg;
00108 
00109     if (get_phase_type() != UVM_POSTRUN_PHASE) { // postrun phases are not generalized yet
00110         int result = do_execute(pmod);
00111 
00112         if (result && (CHECK_STOP_AT_PHASE_END() == true)) {
00113             SC_REPORT_INFO(UVM_PHASE_CTRL_STOP_USER, "");
00114 #ifdef UVM_ML_PORTABLE
00115             // TODO - should be be incorporated into the phase controller instead?
00116             sc_get_curr_simcontext()->stop();
00117 #endif
00118             //  result = 0;
00119         }
00120     }
00121     else {
00122         uvm_component* pcomp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); 
00123         if (pcomp != NULL) {
00124             if (_name.compare("final") == 0)
00125                 pcomp->final_phase(this);
00126             else if (_name.compare("extract") == 0)
00127                 pcomp->extract_phase(this);
00128             else if (_name.compare("check") == 0)
00129                 pcomp->check_phase(this);
00130             else if (_name.compare("report") == 0)
00131                 pcomp->report_phase(this);
00132             else
00133             {
00134                 outmsg << _name << endl;
00135                 SC_REPORT_FATAL(UVM_PHASE_UNKNOWN, outmsg.str().c_str());
00136                 exit(1);        // TODO - is 'exit()' needed here after a FATAL?
00137             }
00138         }
00139     }
00140 }

00142 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 // Phase specific functionality
00144 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 
00146 int uvm_build_phase::do_execute(sc_core::sc_module * pmod)
00147 {
00148     int result = 1;
00149     try
00150     {
00151         NODE_CONSTRUCTION_DONE(pmod) // Calls construction_done() callback
00152                                      // For non-uvm_component sc_module - 
00153                                      // that directly calls before_end_of_elaboration()
00154                                      // For uvm_component it calls build() which, 
00155                                      // if not overriden, invokes before_end_of_elaboration()
00156     }
00157     catch (int)
00158     {
00159         result = 0;
00160     }
00161     return result;
00162 }
00163 
00164 int uvm_build_phase::end()
00165 {
00166     int result = 1;
00167     try
00168     {
00169 #ifndef SIMCONTEXT_EXTENSIONS_OUT
00170         QUASI_STATIC_END_OF_CONSTRUCTION()
00171 #endif
00172     }
00173     catch (int)
00174     {
00175         result = 0;
00176     }
00177     return result;
00178 }
00179 
00180 int uvm_connect_phase::do_execute(sc_core::sc_module * pmod)
00181 {
00182     int result = 1;
00183     try
00184     {
00185         NODE_CONNECT(pmod)
00186     }
00187     catch (int)
00188     {
00189         result = 0;
00190     }
00191     return result;
00192 }
00193 
00194 int uvm_end_of_elaboration_phase::do_execute(sc_core::sc_module * pmod)
00195 {
00196     int result = 1;
00197     try
00198     {
00199         NODE_END_OF_ELABORATION(pmod)
00200     }
00201     catch (int)
00202     {
00203         result = 0;
00204     }
00205     return result;
00206 }
00207 
00208 int uvm_end_of_elaboration_phase::end()
00209 {
00210     int result = 1;
00211     try
00212     {
00213         QUASI_STATIC_END_OF_ELABORATION()
00214     }
00215     catch (int)
00216     {
00217         result = 0;
00218     }
00219     return result;
00220 }

00222 int uvm_start_of_simulation_phase::do_execute(sc_core::sc_module * pmod)
00223 {
00224     int result = 1;
00225     try
00226     {
00227         NODE_START_OF_SIMULATION(pmod)
00228     }
00229     catch (int)
00230     {
00231         result = 0;
00232     }
00233     return result;
00234 }

00239     try
00240     {

00243 #endif

00245     catch (int)
00246     {
00247         result = 0;
00248     }
